About.title: About us
About.mainContent: The Youth Innovation Laboratory (You-i Lab) is an unprecedented initiative from the Potosi Institute for Scientific and Technological Research (IPICYT) that lays the groundwork for the participation of the country's young population in solving social problems for the benefit of a better tomorrow.
About.misionContent: The Youth Innovation Laboratory (You-i Lab) is an unprecedented initiative from the Potosi Institute for Scientific and Technological Research (IPICYT) that lays the groundwork for the participation of the country's young population in solving social problems for the benefit of a better tomorrow.
About.visionContent: The Youth Innovation Laboratory (You-i Lab) is an unprecedented initiative from the Potosi Institute for Scientific and Technological Research (IPICYT) that lays the groundwork for the participation of the country's young population in solving social problems for the benefit of a better tomorrow.
About.historyContent: The You+i laboratory of IPICYT (Instituto Potosino de Investigación Científica y Tecnológica) was founded in 2013 with the objective of researching and developing technologies related to human-machine interaction. Its name comes from the combination of the word "you" which refers to the user and the letter "i" for interface, seeking to create a "juxtaposition" between humans and technology, through the design of intuitive and efficient interfaces that enhance the user experience. Since then, the laboratory has collaborated in various research and innovation projects in this field.
